attributes.description: A dictionary object of technique.attribute objects.
attributes.gltf_detailedDescription: A dictionary object of technique.attribute objects.  Each object defines an attribute input with a type and a semantic.

uniforms.description: A dictionary object of technique.uniform objects.
uniforms.gltf_detailedDescription: A dictionary object of technique.uniform objects.  Each object defines a uniform input with a type and an optional semantic and value.
